quote: the risk of brain injury from a rollercoaster is not in the rides, but in the rider – caused by previously undetected brain or neck conditions.
While Formula 1 (F1) racing drivers may feel around 5-G’s, under heavy braking, they can experience over 100 -G’s if a crash causes them to decelerate quickly over a short distance.
G-forces can also detach a retina.
